author: lgray
body:
This PR implements HGCal clusters made of multiple layer clusters. 
These, eventually, will form the basis of physics object reconstruction and analysis using HGCal.
The HGCalMultiCluster class itself is derived from PFCluster so that it can be easily used later in superclustering and particle flow. 

Using an igprof report from #16813 there was a simple optimization to vastly speed up the layer clusters as well.

Attn:@emeschi
title: Implement HGCal "Multiclusters"
